description:
cmd/gc: &x panics if x does

See golang.org/s/go12nil.

This CL is about getting all the right checks inserted.
A followup CL will add an optimization pass to
remove redundant checks.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=749d02164043 ***

cmd/gc: &x panics if x does

See golang.org/s/go12nil.

This CL is about getting all the right checks inserted.
A followup CL will add an optimization pass to
remove redundant checks.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12970043

Probabaly it's caused by this:
$ go test -race -c pkg/runtime/race/testdata/mop_test.go
pkg/runtime/race/testdata/mop_test.go:1440: internal compiler error: naddr:
ONAME class i 130


On Thu, Aug 15, 2013 at 10:39 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
